hero.title: Real-Time Detection and Tracking
hero.subtitle: Complete Computer Vision platform with object detection, facial recognition, and video analysis. Trusted by 200+ companies in security, retail, and industry.

features.title: Everything You Need for Computer Vision
features.subtitle: REST API, SDKs in 5 languages, pre-trained models, and edge deployment
features.feature1_desc: Optimized YOLO v8 with 80+ classes. Real-time processing up to 120 FPS. Edge device deployment with TensorRT.
features.feature2_desc: 99.8% accuracy in 1:N identification. Facial landmarks, age, gender, and emotion detection. GDPR compliant.
features.feature3_desc: Integrated DeepSORT and ByteTrack. Tracking in complex scenarios with occlusions. Trajectory analysis.
features.feature4_desc: Batch and streaming processing. Event detection, people counting, behavior analysis.
features.feature5_desc: Optimized for NVIDIA Jetson, Intel NUC, Raspberry Pi. INT8 quantized models with minimal accuracy loss.
features.feature6_desc: Complete REST API. SDKs in Python, JavaScript, Java, C++, and Go. Webhooks for real-time events.

cases.title: Production Use Cases
cases.subtitle: Real implementations across industries
cases.case1_desc: Intrusion detection, facial recognition of suspects, anomaly behavior analysis in monitored environments.
cases.case2_desc: Customer counting, movement heatmaps, queue analysis, shelf product detection.
cases.case3_desc: Automated visual inspection, defect detection, product classification on industrial production lines.
cases.case4_desc: Traffic monitoring, violation detection, vehicle counting, urban flow analysis.
